name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
description: Provides comprehensive insurance against the failure of crops.
benefit: Financial support for crop loss due to natural calamities.

name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
description: Credit scheme for farmers to meet short-term financial requirements.
benefit: Access to timely and adequate credit at low interest rates.

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
description: Aimed at promoting organic farming through cluster development.
benefit: Incentives for adoption of organic farming and certification.

name: e-NAM (National Agriculture Market)
description: An online trading platform for agricultural commodities.
benefit: Better price discovery and transparency for farmers across markets.
